description: ff. 207. 266 x 180; 210 x 140 mm. 25 lin. Rajab 888. Commentary on the work of Abū Shujāʻ, d. after 500/1106: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 492 (commentary 2); S I, 677. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى فلق الموجودات
